thread.title: WATCH: Maharashtra BJP leaders’ ‘sanskari birthday celebrations’ video goes viral | The Indian Express
thread.title_full: WATCH: Maharashtra BJP leaders’ ‘sanskari birthday celebrations’ video goes viral | The Indian Express

author: Trends Desk
title: WATCH: Maharashtra BJP leaders’ ‘sanskari birthday celebrations’ video goes viral | The Indian Express
text:
WATCH: Maharashtra BJP leaders’‘sanskari birthday celebrations’ video goes viral WATCH: Maharashtra BJP leaders’‘sanskari birthday celebrations’ video goes viral The video is apparently from the birthday celebrations of BJP member Soneya Naik. By: Trends Desk | New Delhi | Published:February 17, 2017 12:34 pm Reportedly, the celebrations earned the irk of senior party leaders, following which, five of the workers present at the party were asked to resign. (Source: Alankar Sawai/Twitter) 
Even as five states in the country are busy in electioneering, this video of purportedly BJP workers in Maharashtra is going viral for altogether different reasons. The video shows a group of men and women dancing away to old Bollywood hit numbers, in what seems like a BJP office. 
ALSO READ | WATCH: ‘America first, India second: Because no one loves you like we do’ 
According to a report by Maharashtra Today, the video is from the birthday celebrations of BJP member Soneya Naik. Reportedly, the celebrations earned the ire of senior party leaders, following which, five of the workers present at the party were asked to resign. The video has surfaced on the Internet, with many sharing the clip with the caption: “How to celebrate Sanskari Mata-Pita day? Learn from the BJP Mira Road Bhayander team. Pls watch the video & become sanskari.”
